isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Owner/Operator Spare Switch

svcproc.title: Owner/Operator Spare Switch
svcproc.para: Refer to OWNER/OPERATOR SPARE SWITCH circuit diagram in CTS-5119S. This option provides switched battery power on circuit 14AQ to the owner operator connection. Power from the B2 battery stud is applied to the spare accessory relay (167) common terminal. With the key switch in the or position, the relay is energized, applying the power to the spare accessory switch (517).
